text: Nicholas 'Nick' Croombes (born 1958) is a retired British boxer. ==Boxing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the 71 kg light- middleweight division, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:British male boxers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Boxers at the 1982 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Light-middleweight boxers
title: Nick Croombes
